pages.text: The best weapons (in my opinion) are the halberds, greatswords and longswords. The halberds and greatswords have sweeping and reach which is fantastic for hitting enemies far away.$(br2)The best early-game material is platinum. $(bold)NOT$() the Wyrmroost platinum; the Baer’s Additions platinum. It’s between diamond and netherite, but it’s just about as common as diamond,
though it usually generates in smaller veins.
